title: New: Little Kid – River of Blood
content:
Artwork by Marija Kovach

The story behind the creation of Little Kid‘s music is sometimes as enthralling as the stories within the songs. Kenny Boothby (Kid) is clearly someone with a lust for experimentation. The organ in his new track River of Blood for example, was a single note played directly into a microcassette recorder for the duration of the cassette; adjusting the tape’s playback speed then changed the note’s pitch.

Away from the experimentation is a voice and a message that is rooted in classic songwriting, a reverberating acoustic guitars and the most human of voices deliver a moment of pure human introspection.
